Room.Name: High Over Baldywyne River
Room.ShortDescription: You are riding a dragon who flies over the Baldywyne. 50.n4.e2.s0.w0
Room.LongDescription: The great river below you rushes from the mouth of the Tasletek Gorge, and rolls south towards the Gotland Glenn. Eventually, it will pass through the village of Brownhaven on its way to the grand city of Rhivlintz. From there, it will empty into the Gulf of Tarquin.
